about_the_game:
Glorious Companions is a turn-based tactical RPG set in the rich, open world of Navaroth. Lead a group of battle-proven companions through an epic quest to collect all the vault crystals and end Xandar’s Wrath. Play either of the two campaigns or venture into point-limited, wargaming inspired PvP battles in both Online and Local Multiplayer. Command the disciplined and versatile Steam-wielding Valrenay or unleash the fury of the Scarres, a vengeful race of fierce red lizardfolk.

The land of Terscara has fallen into a peaceful coexistence as the 300 year old war between Scarres and Valrenay has ceased to an end. The Scarres seemingly accepted their role as second rate inhabitants of Terscara. Or at least that’s what they want the humans to think. In truth they trust in a prophecy, which promises a coming of a powerful Blood Chieftain, who will help them triumph against the humans.

However, recently a new threat emerged on the horizon. The giant statues called Naalans started rumbling as if they were awakening. More and more folk started reporting weird events happening around the giants. Some even say that they’ve seen the Naalans tilting their heads slightly. In the face of the unveiling crisis, the King of Valrenay decided to call in all brave enough to discover the underlying root of the issue and solve it once and for all.

Recruit new troops to your battlecrew, train and equip them to prepare for the varied encounters awaiting you in Terscara. Choose from different mercenary classes from the two available factions and explore their potentials and unique battle abilities that they possess.

Buy brand new weapons and armor from city-dwelling merchants or hunt specific enemies to loot equipment from their dead bodies. Find perfect combinations for each of your trusty warriors by exploring different skill branches and level up choices. Every companion will bring different strengths outside battle too, be it when setting up camps or dealing with different Points of Interest.

As your companions get better, you’ll be facing a plethora of different threats across the island of Terscara. Starting from the regular bandits and animal enemies, soon you’ll end up diving into the ancient vaults that serve to protect the Crystals of Creation. The time has come to use the Crystals to repair what they’ve caused.

Inside each vault you’ll find a series of rooms populated with unique and challenging enemies, ending up with the legendary boss encounters. Not only will the vault guardians introduce unique battle tactics for you to overcome, they will also provide unique loot opportunities. Use their mythical artifacts to increase your group’s power.

The search for vaults will take you across the vast open world of Terscara, where you’ll encounter all kinds of Points of Interests, valuable resources and settlements. Journey across nine varied regions including icy tundras, misty swamps, scorching deserts, lush forests and The Fiery Volcano.

Visit the beautiful cities scattered across the Kingdom of Valrenay before venturing South to the lively yet dangerous towns of the Scarres Arcanate. On your way, you’ll encounter outposts, camps and mines featuring both opportunities and dangers for brave adventurers.

Forge your legacy in a world on the brink of chaos, where every decision, battle, and companion shapes the fate of Terscara.

content_descriptors.notes: Glorious Companions features depictions of violence between non-realistic characters.
